definition: to think of the pain when the pain is gone (idiom)/to ponder about a painful experience
ache/pain/sorrow/deeply/thoroughly
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
to think/to consider
ache/pain/sorrow/deeply/thoroughly

sentences.english: Pain and enable us to learn from their mistakes, to grow.
sentences.chinese: 痛能使我們痛定思痛，得以成長。

sentences.english: We need to cry foul, require change, and start leading the charge ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要痛定思痛，要求變革，並首先自己做好表率。

sentences.english: After the painful experience, everybody study decision, start work however.
sentences.chinese: 痛定思痛後，大家研究決定，開始剿匪工作。

definition: to determine/to resolve
to make a firm resolution
to be strongly determined to succeed (idiom)
to draw a lesson (from a setback)
one stumble, unable to rise (idiom); a setback leading to total collapse/ruined at a stroke/unable to recover after a minor hitch
to learn a lesson from the mistakes of one's predecessor (idiom)
discouraged/downhearted
to follow the track of an overturned cart/to repeat a disastrous policy
determination/resolution/determined/firm and resolute/to make up one's mind/CL:個|个[ge4]
to be determined
lesson/moral/to chide sb/to lecture sb
lit. to mend the pen after sheep are lost (idiom)/fig. to act belatedly/better late than never/to lock the stable door after the horse has bolted
to work energetically for prosperity (of the country)
lit. to lie on firewood and taste gall (idiom); fig. suffering patiently, but firmly resolved on revenge
bitter and hateful (idiom)/to grieve and lament (over sth)
failed and wiped over the floor (idiom); to fail utterly/a crushing defeat/beaten and in a hopeless position
